item.description: STAR
item.author: mthartma@stanford.edu (Mike Hartman)

item.title: New version: system/git version 2.39.1
item.description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/cdo version 2.1.1
item.description: CDO is a collection of command line Operators to manipulate and analyse Climate and NWP model Data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/julia version 1.8.4
item.description: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for numerical computing.
item.author: mthartma@stanford.edu (Mike Hartman)

item.title: New module: math/dealii version 9.4.1
item.description: deal.II is a C++ program library targeted at the computational solution of partial differential equations using adaptive finite elements.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/mpifileutils version 0.11.1
item.description: mpiFileUtils is a suite of MPI-based tools to manage large datasets, which may vary from large directory trees to large files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: viz/py-seaborn version 0.12.1_py39
item.description: Seaborn is a Python data visualization library based on matplotlib. It provides a high-level interface for drawing attractive and informative statistical graphics.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/make version 4.4
item.description: GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/cuda version 12.0.0
item.description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface (API) model created by Nvidia. It allows software developers and software engineers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit (GPU) for general purpose processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/py-clustershell version 1.9.0_py39
item.description: ClusterShell is an event-driven open source Python library, designed to run local or distant commands in parallel on server farms or on large Linux clusters.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: viz/mathgl version 8.0.1
item.description: MathGL is a library to make high-quality scientific graphics.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/motioncor2 version 1.5.0
item.description: MotionCor2 is a multi-GPU accelerated program which corrects anisotropic image motion at the single pixel level.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/libtiff version 4.4.0
item.description: libtiff provides support for the Tag Image File Format (TIFF), a widely used format for storing image data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/zstd version 1.5.2
item.description: Zstandard, or zstd, is a fast lossless compression algorithm, targeting real-time compression scenarios at zlib-level and better compression ratios.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/libjpeg-turbo version 2.1.4
item.description: libjpeg-turbo is a JPEG image codec that uses SIMD instructions (MMX, SSE2, AVX2, NEON, AltiVec) to accelerate baseline JPEG compression and decompression on x86, x86-64, ARM, and PowerPC systems
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: chemistry/vasp version 6.3.2
item.description: The Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP) is a computer program for atomic scale materials modelling, e.g. electronic structure calculations and quantum-mechanical molecular dynamics, from first principles.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
